#+begin_src R :session tky-2011-hsv-h :results output :exports both
gethist <- function(df, vGrain=10) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_HSV_double_histogram(phenovis_H(), df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), vGrain) %>%
        filter(H != 0) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  rename(H.count = Count) %>%
  # V histogram is spread, let's gather it
  gather(V, V.count, -Name, -Width, -Height, -Pixels, -H, -H.count) %>%
  # Remove the V, convert to integer
  mutate(V = as.integer(gsub("V", "", V))) %>%
  # Map to [0,1], convert to double
  mutate(V = as.numeric(round(V/9, 2))) %>%
  # Cosmetics
  separate(Name, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'Dir', 'Subdir', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -Dir, -Subdir) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='__', into=c('Filename', 'Camera_ID')) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time', 'Dataset')) %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time)
df.histograms
#+end_src

gethist <- function(df, vGrain=10) {

}

  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%

Now let's calculate metrics. 
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session tky-2011-gcc-mean :results output :exports both

gethist <- function(df, grain=100) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_gcc_color_histogram(df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), grain) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  # Cosmetics
  separate(Name, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'Dir', 'Subdir', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -Dir, -Subdir) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='__', into=c('Filename', 'Camera_ID')) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time', 'Dataset')) %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time)
df.histograms
#+END_SRC

#+begin_src R :session tky-2012-hsv-h :results output :exports both
gethist <- function(df, vGrain=10) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_HSV_double_histogram(phenovis_H(), df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), vGrain) %>%
        filter(H != 0) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  rename(H.count = Count) %>%
  # V histogram is spread, let's gather it
  gather(V, V.count, -Name, -Width, -Height, -Pixels, -H, -H.count) %>%
  # Remove the V, convert to integer
  mutate(V = as.integer(gsub("V", "", V))) %>%
  # Map to [0,1], convert to double
  mutate(V = as.numeric(round(V/9, 2))) %>%
  # Cosmetics
  separate(Name, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'Dir', 'Subdir', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -Dir, -Subdir) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='__', into=c('Filename', 'Camera_ID')) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time', 'Dataset')) %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time)
df.histograms
#+end_src

gethist <- function(df, vGrain=10) {

        filter(H != 0) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

Now let's calculate metrics. 
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session tky-2012-gcc-mean :results output :exports both

gethist <- function(df, grain=100) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_gcc_color_histogram(df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), grain) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  # Cosmetics
  separate(Name, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'Dir', 'Subdir', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -Dir, -Subdir) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='__', into=c('Filename', 'Camera_ID')) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time', 'Dataset')) %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time)
df.histograms
#+END_SRC

* New analysis of the AHS dataset
By looking at the images in the AHS Dataset, I created [[masks/alles-ahs-t24_d.jpg][this mask]] to
work with pictures taken from the top of the observation tower. I will
make an analysis of this dataset using the different approaches
developed so far.
*** Dataset overview
Startup...
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session ahs-overview :results output :exports both
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
options(crayon.enabled = FALSE)

#+RESULTS:

Now let's read the images we have into a tibble

df.images <- tibble(Picture.Filename=list.files(c("/Volumes/ExtensionHD/PEN/ahs-full-t24_d-imported"), recursive=TRUE, pattern="jpg", full.names=TRUE)) %>%
  separate(Picture.Filename, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -D, -E) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time','Dataset', 'Camera_ID'), extra='merge') %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%

  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%

df.images

#+begin_src R :session ahs-full-hsv-h :results output :exports both
gethist <- function(df, vGrain=10) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_HSV_double_histogram(phenovis_H(), df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), vGrain) %>%
        filter(H != 0) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  rename(H.count = Count) %>%
  # V histogram is spread, let's gather it
  gather(V, V.count, -Name, -Width, -Height, -Pixels, -H, -H.count) %>%
  # Remove the V, convert to integer
  mutate(V = as.integer(gsub("V", "", V))) %>%
  # Map to [0,1], convert to double
  mutate(V = as.numeric(round(V/9, 2)))
df.histograms
#+end_src

  separate(Mask.Filename, sep="/", into=c("A", "Mask"), remove=FALSE) %>%
  mutate(Mask = gsub(".jpg", "", Mask)) %>%
  mutate(Mask = gsub("-", "_", Mask)) %>%
  select(-A)
df.masks
#+end_src

Now we read all the images available
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session ahs-full-gcc-mean :results output :exports both
df.images <- tibble(Picture.Filename=list.files(c("/Volumes/ExtensionHD/PEN/ahs-full-t24_d-imported"), recursive=TRUE, pattern="jpg", full.names=TRUE)) %>%
  separate(Picture.Filename, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -D, -E) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time','Dataset', 'Camera_ID'), extra='merge') %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time) %>%
  arrange(Year, Day, Hour, Minute)
df.images

Now let's calculate metrics. 
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session ahs-full-gcc-mean :results output :exports both

gethist <- function(df, grain=100) {
    mask <- df %>% slice(1) %>% pull(Mask.Filename);
    phenovis_read_mask(mask);
    phenovis_get_gcc_color_histogram(df %>% pull(Picture.Filename), grain) %>%
        as_tibble()
}

df.histograms <- df.joined %>%
  do(gethist(.)) %>%
  # Cosmetics
  separate(Name, sep='/', into=c('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'Filename'), remove=FALSE) %>%
  select(-A, -B, -C, -D, -E) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('.jpg', '', Filename)) %>%
  mutate(Filename = gsub('dc_', '', Filename)) %>%
  separate(Filename, sep='_', into=c('Year', 'Day', 'Time','Dataset', 'Camera_ID'), extra='merge') %>%
  mutate(Time = gsub('\\+.*', '', Time)) %>%
  mutate(Hour = as.integer(substr(Time, 1, 2))) %>%
  mutate(Minute = as.integer(substr(Time, 3, 4))) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Day = as.integer(Day)) %>%
  select(-Time) %>%
  arrange(Year, Day, Hour, Minute)
df.histograms

And now let's plot it.
#+BEGIN_SRC R :session ahs-full-gcc-mean :results output graphics :file img/ahs-full-gcc-mean.png :exports both :width 1400 :height 400

df.palette <- df.histograms %>%
  mutate(Color = hex(RGB(Bin_color_r, Bin_color_g, Bin_color_b))) %>%
  mutate(Code = as.character(Color)) %>%
  select(Color, Code)

palette.list <- as.character(df.palette$Color)
names(palette.list) <- df.palette$Code

df.histograms  %>%
  filter(Year != 2015) %>%
  filter(Bin_value != 0) %>%
  mutate(Color = as.character(hex(RGB(Bin_color_r, Bin_color_g, Bin_color_b)))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Day, y = Bin_value/Pixels, fill=as.factor(Color))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = palette.list) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity') +
  theme_bw(base_size=16) +
  theme(#axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        #axis.text = element_blank(),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm"),
        legend.spacing = unit(0, "mm"),
        panel.grid = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        legend.justification = "left",
        legend.box.spacing = unit(0, "pt"),
        legend.box.margin = margin(0,0,0,0),
        legend.title = element_blank()) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(nrow = 1)) +
  xlab("DOY") +
  ylab("Normalized size of bins") +
  facet_grid(. ~ Year)
#+END_SRC
